description:
Time is money. Creating a system using your Infusionsoft application to create appointments and automate confirmation and reminders of the appointment can save you and your team time and resources.

There is a way to do this in Infusionsoft that does not require using additional software plug ins. Many customers do not know about this functionality. In this course you will learn exactly how to implement this functionality in your Infusionsoft application.

If you are interested in recording appointments in Contact records in Infusionsoft, this course is for you.

If you would like to automatically send an appointment notification to a member of your team to alert them of an appointment, this course is for you.

If you would like to automate sending appointment confirmations and reminders to contacts, this course is for you.

If you want to incorporate a 3rd party scheduling software into your process, this couse is not for you.

There are 17 lectures and over 1 hour of content in this course!
title: How To Create and Automate Appointments In Infusionsoft
